typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	fileList: true,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal',
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> FromDataLakeGen1CSVFiles
FromDataLakeGen1CSVFiles select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
